metadata.synopsis: A goblin participating in a large raid on a druid grove - these lines are spoken during and after the fight

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
0.text: Hope we weren't s'posed to take any prisoners...
0.context: NodeContext: standing over slaughtered enemies - pleased with himself, but slightly worried they might have gone overboard in killing EVERYONE

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
1.context: NodeContext: warcry, as he prepares to charge into battle
